ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Girls
ygData.msgSnippet: Around 4 years back I made a female toon and named it after my wife.  There was a big difference in the way this toon was treated by others.  I got healed more
ygData.messageBody:
Around 4 years back I made a female toon and named
it after my wife. There was a big difference in the
way this toon was treated by others. I got healed
more and rarely died all kinda people wanted to help
me and if you flirted them little wood elf eyes about
bam groups started looking you.
So I created another female wood elf this time a
druid. I was having trouble getting levels with my
male druid. At level 7 another female druid came up
to me gave me all her lv 34 gear. She said she was
fed up with the game and wanted to pass her stuff on
to another sister druid. She sat down camped and
deleted her account.
Today my druid is my highest lv toon and still my
best dressed toon. The guys don't flirt and hit on me
as much anymore. I think they finally realized it
just my be a dude sitting there behind them keys. LOL
My 2 copper Kymi Blackwolf
48 Druid
Zebuxerok(close enough)
